name: CPVoiceControlState
desc: A voice control state containing title variants and images for use by a voice control template.

items.name: init(identifier: String, titleVariants: [String]?, image: UIImage?, repeats: Bool)
var identifier: String
items.desc: The string that your app uses to identify the voice control state.

items.name: var titleVariants: [String]?
items.desc: The array of title variants for the voice control state.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image displayed while the voice control template is in this state.

items.name: var repeats: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the display of an animated image repeats the animation sequence indefinitely.
